descriptor.name: Sumeet Double Wall Water Bottle,24 Hours Hot & Cold 1000 ml Flask  (Pack of 1, Silver, Steel) (color - white) by Home & Kitchen Store
descriptor.short_desc: Every Sumeet product is carefully built to deliver exceptional quality. Sumeet presents Double Walled Vacuum Stainless-Steel Flask which keeps water or beverages hot up to 24 hours or cold up to 24 hours as per the requirement. It encourages you to live healthy lifestyle by switching to steel, TRUST IN EVERY DROP. Its superior insulation high performance vacuum technology with Premium quality Stainless Steel construction makes sure that it Maintains the temperature of the liquid for 24 hours. It’s condensation resist property ensures that the bottle does not sweat or leave behind wet rings on the surface. This bottle has Matt Finishing which enhances the appeal and very user friendly too.
descriptor.long_desc: Every Sumeet product is carefully built to deliver exceptional quality. Sumeet presents Double Walled Vacuum Stainless-Steel Flask which keeps water or beverages hot up to 24 hours or cold up to 24 hours as per the requirement. It encourages you to live healthy lifestyle by switching to steel, TRUST IN EVERY DROP. Its superior insulation high performance vacuum technology with Premium quality Stainless Steel construction makes sure that it Maintains the temperature of the liquid for 24 hours. It’s condensation resist property ensures that the bottle does not sweat or leave behind wet rings on the surface. This bottle has Matt Finishing which enhances the appeal and very user friendly too.

descriptor.name: Bekner Thermosteel Flip Lid Flask,Hot&Cold Water Bottle 500 ml bottle 500 ml Flask  (Pack of 1, Silver, Steel) (color - white) by Home & Kitchen Store
descriptor.short_desc: Flip Flask - Presenting thermosteel bottles with a unique flip lid that makes pouring completely hassle-free and spill-free for you! The lid of this flask doubles up as a cup for drinking. It is Thermosteel insulated with inner and outer steel and is designed to keep your beverages hot or cold for 24 hours

descriptor.name: pexpo 1000ml 24 Hrs Hot and Cold Flask with Jute-bag Vacuum Insulated Flamingo 1000 ml Flask  (Pack of 1, Blue, Steel) (color - white) by Home & Kitchen Store
descriptor.short_desc: The Pexpo Flamingo range of tri-ply vacuum insulated bottles are made in India three layers of BIS metals (304 stainless steel, aluminium, 304 stainless steel) & vacuum insulation between them. These bottles can keep your beverages hot & cold for more than 24 hours, when completely filled. Each Pexpo Electro thermo bottle passes BIS IS 17526 : 2021 standard for Indian flasks & International standards of EN 12546 of vacuum flasks & containers because of the proprietary tri-ply vacuum technology developed after years of research at Pexpo.
descriptor.long_desc: The Pexpo Flamingo range of tri-ply vacuum insulated bottles are made in India three layers of BIS metals (304 stainless steel, aluminium, 304 stainless steel) & vacuum insulation between them. These bottles can keep your beverages hot & cold for more than 24 hours, when completely filled.
